headline: How Recent Shifts Are Changing the Narrative for Moderna Stock
summary: Moderna's narrative is shifting as analysts modestly trim their fair value from $37.32 to $35.78 per share and nudge the discount rate from 7.13% to 7.13%, reflecting a slightly higher required return amid ongoing debates around execution risk and cash sustainability. Long term revenue growth expectations have also eased from 10.31% to 10.22%, as models balance stronger liquidity and oncology optionality against litigation and pipeline uncertainties. Stay tuned to see how you can track these...
